socorro_links.comment_text:
Diagnostic assert 18 crash reports from 12 installs of Firefox for Android, 6 for 5 of Firefox for Desktop.

Crash report: https://crash-stats.mozilla.org/report/index/ebde87b2-e58f-48a2-b4c6-1983f0251106

MOZ_CRASH Reason:
```
MOZ_DIAGNOSTIC_ASSERT(XRE_IsParentProcess())
```

Top 10 frames:
```
0  libxul.so  MOZ_CrashSequence(void*, long)  mfbt/Assertions.h:242
0  libxul.so  mozilla::net::HttpBaseChannel::DoApplyContentConversionsInternal(nsIStreamLis...  netwerk/protocol/http/HttpBaseChannel.cpp:1576
1  libxul.so  mozilla::net::HttpBaseChannel::DoApplyContentConversions(nsIStreamListener*, ...  netwerk/protocol/http/HttpBaseChannel.cpp:1469
1  libxul.so  mozilla::net::HttpChannelChild::DoOnStartRequest(nsIRequest*)  netwerk/protocol/http/HttpChannelChild.cpp:607
2  libxul.so  mozilla::net::HttpChannelChild::OnStartRequest(mozilla::net::nsHttpResponseHe...  netwerk/protocol/http/HttpChannelChild.cpp:526
3  libxul.so  mozilla::net::ChannelEventQueue::FlushQueue()  netwerk/ipc/ChannelEventQueue.cpp:84
4  libxul.so  mozilla::net::ChannelEventQueue::MaybeFlushQueue()  netwerk/ipc/ChannelEventQueue.h:351
4  libxul.so  mozilla::net::ChannelEventQueue::CompleteResume()  netwerk/ipc/ChannelEventQueue.h:336
4  libxul.so  mozilla::net::ChannelEventQueue::ResumeInternal()::CompleteResumeRunnable::Run()  netwerk/ipc/ChannelEventQueue.cpp:143
5  libxul.so  mozilla::RunnableTask::Run()  xpcom/threads/TaskController.cpp:705
```
